We are recruiting to fill the position below:

They company are seeking to hire an experienced candidate to provide technical support across the store(s), ensure all IT systems, equipment, and networks operate smoothly, support staff with day-to-day technical issues, maintain critical retail systems such as tills, handheld devices, self-checkout machines, and back-office systems, also help implement new technologies.
     

            
    



They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: IT Officer / Manager
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Part-time
Work Schedule: Monday – Saturday: 8 am to 6 pm

Key Responsibilities


	System and Database Administration.
	Manage Website.
	Software installation, configuration, database backup and restore/recovery maintenance.
	Windows operating System maintenance and repair.
	Performance of troubleshooting and diagnosis of hardware/software,
	Provision of solution to network failure.
	Any other issues that needs the IT officer’s attention.
	Coordinate with procurement and purchasing teams to place orders for replenishment stock, ensuring timely delivery and availability of inventory items.
	Support inventory and stock management systems, ensuring smooth operation
	Develop and implement effective social media strategies including to create, curate, and manage engaging content across all social media platforms.
	Monitor, listen, and respond to users in a positive and professional manner.Manage social media advertising campaigns to drive targeted traffic and sales.
	Track and report on social media performance and ROI.
	Any other assigned task by the management.


Requirements


	B.Sc / HND / OND in IT related course with minimum of 2 years of relevant work experience.
	Experience supporting Windows environments, POS systems, and networked devices.
	Strong knowledge of computer hardware, software, and troubleshooting methods.
	Good understanding of basic networking (Wi-Fi, routers/switches, IP addressing).
	Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work under pressure.
	Strong communication skills, with the ability to explain technical issues simply.
	Ability to prioritise tasks in a fast-paced retail environment.
	Previous IT support experience in retail or a similar customer-facing environment.
	Familiarity with retail systems such as POS, back-office stock systems, or handheld scanners.


Salary
N100,000 - N150,000 / month

Method of Application
